data.name: Crypto Converter
data.description:
Your task is to create a program that allows users to convert a given amount of a cryptocurrency to its equivalent value in another cryptocurrency.


Example:

```
Welcome to the Simple Crypto Converter!

Please enter the amount you wish to convert: 0.5
Please enter the cryptocurrency you want to convert from (BTC, ETH, LTC): BTC
Please enter the cryptocurrency you want to convert to (BTC, ETH, LTC): ETH

Converting 0.5 BTC to ETH...

Result: 0.5 BTC = 5.73 ETH

Thank you for using the Simple Crypto Converter!
```

Conversion rates:

### 1 BTC = 11.46 ETH
### 1 ETH = 0.0873 BTC
### 1 LTC = 0.2284 BTC

*Note: 
The conversion rates provided are arbitrary and not reflective of actual market values.*
